meanings.definition: To preserve or cool food or drink by keeping it in a refrigerator.
meanings.sent1: Mom refrigerates the fruits to keep them fresh.
meanings.sent2: I always refrigerate my leftovers to prevent spoilage.
meanings.sent3: The penguin tried to refrigerate its fish by sitting on them.
meanings.sent4: His icy stare refrigerates the room, making everyone shiver.
meanings.sent5: The cool breeze refrigerates the entire kitchen, making it a pleasant place to cook.

meanings.definition: To chill or keep something cold.
meanings.sent1: She refrigerates the soda cans before the party.
meanings.sent2: Remember to refrigerate the milk after opening it.
meanings.sent3: The snowman wanted to refrigerate his nose to keep it from melting.
meanings.sent4: The air conditioning unit refrigerates the room quickly on hot days.
meanings.sent5: The ice pack refrigerates the injury, reducing swelling and pain.
